mapper.insert: insert into inbound_detail ( id, inboundId, productId, number, price, totalMoney, orderDetailId, goodsAllocationId, ctime )values( #{detail.id}, #{detail.inboundId}, #{detail.product.id}, #{detail.number}, #{detail.price}, #{detail.totalMoney}, #{detail.orderDetailId}, #{detail.goodsAllocation.id}, #{detail.ctime} )
